headline: Sunrise Energy Metals (ASX:SRL) Valuation After Lockheed Martin Scandium Deal And Index Top Performance
summary: Why Sunrise Energy Metals is on investors’ radar Sunrise Energy Metals (ASX:SRL) has attracted fresh attention after agreeing a multi year scandium supply deal with Lockheed Martin for its Syerston Project. This highlights the project’s role in long term scandium availability. See our latest analysis for Sunrise Energy Metals. The Lockheed Martin agreement comes after a period of strong momentum, with Sunrise Energy Metals posting 1 month and 3 month share price returns of 15.79% and 48.40%...
